name: Dino Game (Piechicken20)
description:
!!! DOWNLOAD EVERY FILE !!!

- pixilart-drawing (8).jpg, pixilart-drawing (9).jpg, pixilart-drawing (10).jpg, 

..., pixilart-drawing (13).jpg

This is a knock-off of the game Dino Run by Google.

All of the art was created by me using https://www.pixilart.com

There is a certain way you have to set this up in order to make it work:

1. Create a folder (on your desktop) and name it "dino game".

2. Open that folder and add a new folder inside the dino game folder, name it "assets".

3. Move all the .jpg images to the assets folder.

4. Move the dinorun.exe file to the dino game folder, but make sure it is NOT INSIDE the assets folder.
